answers.author: James Lenner
answers.text:
You may check with your local chamber of commerce. I know our County Chamber holds an annual "Groundhog Day Breakfast" that showcases local business achievements. I am actually looking to reproduce their breakfast in smaller scale for my community. Good Luck!

answers.author: Jayme Bosio
answers.text:
The Palm Beach County, FL, Consumer Affairs Division operates the "MVP Program" - a unique public-private venture designed to recognize customer-friendly busineses and business practices in Palm Beach County, while bolstering consumer confidence. MVP designed businesses are profiled for public review on the PBC Consumer Affairs web site: http://www.pbcgov.org/publicsafety/consumeraffairs/ .

text: I'm trying to find information on business recognition programs.  Are there any established programs?  I'm looking for something beyond a thank you note and/or newspaper articles.  Thanks.
title: Best Practices for Business Recognition?
